main: ^I just simply find your collection of books to be outstanding. I can quite understand how come you never left here. Oh, I was just reading this one riddle.
^Can you solve it? You've never been one to back down.
^"At the sound of me, men may dream or stamp their feet at the sound of me, women may laugh or sometimes weep."
chosen: ^! You saw it in the room didn't you? Here, take this, you know where to use it.
